exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros x y z H. unfold Rabs. destruct H as [Hmin Hmax]. apply Rabs_le_between. split. - apply Rabs_le_between in Hmin. destruct Hmin. apply Rabs_triang_inv. rewrite R_dist. rewrite R_dist in H. lra. - apply Rabs_le_between in Hmax. destruct Hmax. apply Rabs_triang_inv. rewrite R_dist. rewrite R_dist in H. lra.
